Report.name: rep1
Report.SqlStatement: SELECT t1.id,t1.version,t1.agency_id,t1.ar_description,t1.ar_name,t1.description,t1.major_sector_id,t1.name,t1.national_code,t1.parent_id,t2.id,t2.version,t2.ar_description,t2.ar_name,t2.code,t2.description,t2.name FROM budget_entity t1,major_sector t2 WHERE t1.major_sector_id=t2.id AND t1.parent_id=t1.id

Report.name: StatusByManagerReport
Report.SqlStatement: SELECT t1.id,t1.first_name,t1.last_name,t2.status_bygmgr FROM employee t1,leave t2 WHERE t2.employee_id=t1.id

Report.name: false emp
Report.SqlStatement: SELECT t1.id,t2.bage_num,t2.is_deleted FROM employee t1,employee_bage t2 WHERE t2.employee_id=t1.id AND t2.is_deleted='False'

Report.name: in rep
Report.SqlStatement: SELECT t1.id,t1.emp_id,t1.emp_no FROM employee t1 WHERE t1.emp_no in ('065650467','62300','93039')

Report.name: rrr
Report.SqlStatement: SELECT t1.id FROM employee t1 WHERE t1.emp_id in ('905077780','852491091','943657239','938075173','034064568') AND t1.religion ='Muslim'

Report.name: emp99
Report.SqlStatement: SELECT t1.id, t1.version, t1.emp_id, t1.living_place_description, t1.religion, t1.avatar_type, t1.first_name, t1.profile_id, t1.job_title_id, t1.last_name, t1.place_of_birth_id, t1.living_place_id, t1.employee_address_id, t1.emp_no, t1.badge_number, t1.last_updated, t1.mid_name, t1.avatar, t1.user_deleted, t1.date_created, t1.active, t1.place_of_birth_description, t1.identifier, t1.salt, t1.employment_status_id, t1.mid_name2 FROM employee t1

Report.name: tt
Report.SqlStatement: SELECT t1.id, t1.version, t1.in_hour, t1.bage_num, t1.att_day, t1.att_type, t1.in_minute, t1.att_year, t1.exit_hour, t1.att_month, t1.exit_minute FROM attendance_sheet t1

Report.name: f
Report.SqlStatement: SELECT t1.first_name, t1.last_name FROM employee t1

Report.name: 1 val
Report.SqlStatement: SELECT t1.first_name, t1.last_name FROM employee t1 WHERE t1.id ='6232'
SELECT t1.id, t1.first_name, t2.is_deleted FROM employee t1,employee_bage t2 WHERE t2.employee_id=t1.id
SELECT t1.id, t1.first_name, t2.is_deleted FROM employee t1,employee_bage t2 WHERE t2.employee_id=t1.id

Report.name: male rep
Report.SqlStatement: SELECT employee.first_name, employee.last_name, employee_profile_attribute.value FROM employee_profile_attribute employee_profile_attribute,employee_profile_employee_profile_attribute employee_profile_employee_profile_attribute,employee_profile employee_profile,employee employee WHERE employee_profile_employee_profile_attribute.employee_profile_attributes_id=employee_profile.id AND employee_profile_employee_profile_attribute.employee_profile_attribute_id=employee_profile_attribute.id AND employee.profile_id=employee_profile.id AND employee_profile_attribute.name ='sex'
